Este juego necesita arreglar:
 Casual, no más "discord snipping"
MM , servidores a 128 tickrate
MM , sistema emparejamiento mejorado
MM , crear un subsistema para jugadores avanzados, semipros puedan competir y seguir evolucionando
Transición a un motor gráfico acorde a los tiempos.

this game is pretty fun i started about 3 years ago.
but then i got bored of it so i quit. but now im playing again heres some fun game modes : combat surf, hns
kz, surf, tricksurf, bhop, bhop awp,
my fav is def combat surf 
i really recomend this game since its free.
but if u want to play competetive i recomend buying prime since you will match up with less cheaters
